Sentencas: The air-sintering and thermal expansion characteristics of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method have been discussed as interconnect materials in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method

Sentencas: Fine perovskite powders with an average particle size of 0.24 mum, and with a surface area of 3.5 m(2)/g, calcined at 800 T for I h, were obtained, After the Co-doped samples were heated at 1600 T for 10 h, surface analysis showed the materials to have a densely packed structure with little sign of porosity.
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method

Sentencas: It was, however, found that large pores remained inside the samples.
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method

Sentencas: By energy dispersive X-ray analysis, it was clarified that the composition on the surface shifted to a B-site lean region by cobalt-vaporization.
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method

Sentencas: The La0.9Sr0.1Cr0.95Al0.02Co0.02O3 sample with a slight chromium-deficiency enhanced bulk diffusion sintering, and showed the relative densities to be greater than or equal to 94% when sintered at 1600 degreesC for 20 h.
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method

Sentencas: The average thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of this material in the temperature range from 50 to 1000 degreesC was 10.4 x 10(-6)/degreesC in air and 11.2 x 10(-6)/degreesC in a H-2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method

Sentencas: The La0.9Sr0.1Cr0.95Al0.02Co0.02O3 powder synthesized by the Pechini method is the one that is suitable for use as the interconnect material for solid oxide fuel cells, (C) 2002
Titulo: Sintering and thermal expansion characterization of Al-doped and Co-doped lanthanum strontium chromites synthesized by the Pechini method
